name: meilisearch
description: Meilisearch is a lightning-fast, open-source search engine with instant results and typo tolerance. It exposes a simple REST API and is designed for simplicity, enabling developers to self-host a search service easily.
features: Instant search: Return search results in milliseconds with as-you-type search experience.
Typo tolerance: Automatically handle typos and misspellings to return relevant results.
Faceted search: Filter results by categories, tags, or custom attributes for refined searching.
Highlighting: Automatically highlight matching terms in search results for better visibility.
Ranking rules: Customize result relevance with configurable ranking and sorting criteria.
Multi-language support: Search across content in multiple languages with language-specific optimizations.
Synonyms: Define synonym groups to improve search accuracy and user experience.
Geo-search: Filter and sort results by geographic location with radius-based queries.
REST API: Simple HTTP API makes integration straightforward for any application.
Dashboard UI: Built-in web interface for testing searches and managing indexes.
Tenant isolation: Support multiple indexes with separate data and configurations.
High performance: Written in Rust for exceptional speed and low resource usage.
